creator: Zynga
descriptionHtml:
Willy Wonka Slots is your lucky ticket to FREE authentic, casino-style slot machine games and the iconic cast of Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory!

Spin to win amazing prizes in this scrumptious free slot game! Create your very own garden of crazy Wonka creations in Sweet Candy Crops, our latest mini-game. Spin in machines to find the best seeds; plant, grow and watch the Credits roll in!

Play is sweeter than ever with free casino slots, fun mini-games and Las Vegas-style slot machines!

Join Charlie as he tours the most eccentric and wonderful confectionery factory of all, Willy Wonka’s Chocolate Factory.

WILLY WONKA SLOTS FEATURES:

AN ALL-NEW WAY TO HARVEST CREDITS: SWEET CANDY CROPS
Every spin gives you a chance to earn seed packs, sugar boosts and big rewards.
Carefully choose which scrumptious crops will go into your customised garden.
Sprinkle your bountiful crops with a dusting of sugar to give them an extra boost.
Choose the perfect moment to harvest the crops and get your credits!

FREE CASINO SLOTS MEET THE MUSICAL FANTASY FILM
Free slot machines with your favourite characters and settings from the film.
Free slots take you on a tour of Wonka’s factory, with each level taking you further into the Chocolate Factory and your favourite characters’ stories!

BONUS SLOTS & DELECTABLE FREE SPINS
Slot machine games that give you the chance to win BIG with the Daily Bonus, Streak Bonus and VIP Bonus.
Bet big with millions of FREE CREDITS and dozens of bonuses!
Up the ante with delectable Free Spins and sweet JACKPOT pay-outs.
Spin the prize wheel to win sweet rewards like extra coins.

SLOTS - THE MOST EXCITING SPINS AVAILABLE ANYWHERE
Spin slots online or offline, wherever you go.
Send and receive Wonka Bar gifts between you and your friends.
View your friends’ progress by connecting to Facebook.
Keep playing! You can sync your level of play across all your devices.

Download Willy Wonka Slots for the sweetest and most authentic slot machines. Don’t wait – Your delicious wins await!

FROM THE MAKERS OF WIZARD OF OZ SLOTS

Spin to win amazing prizes in this scrumptious free slot game! Create your very own garden of crazy Wonka creations in Sweet Candy Crops, our latest mini-game. Spin in machines to find the best seeds; plant, grow and watch the Credits roll in!

Play is sweeter than ever with free casino slots, fun mini-games and Las Vegas-style slot machines!

Join Charlie as he tours the most eccentric and wonderful confectionery factory of all, Willy Wonka’s Chocolate Factory.

WILLY WONKA SLOTS FEATURES:

AN ALL-NEW WAY TO HARVEST CREDITS: SWEET CANDY CROPS
Every spin gives you a chance to earn seed packs, sugar boosts and big rewards.
Carefully choose which scrumptious crops will go into your customised garden.
Sprinkle your bountiful crops with a dusting of sugar to give them an extra boost.
Choose the perfect moment to harvest the crops and get your credits!

FREE CASINO SLOTS MEET THE MUSICAL FANTASY FILM
Free slot machines with your favourite characters and settings from the film.
Free slots take you on a tour of Wonka’s factory, with each level taking you further into the Chocolate Factory and your favourite characters’ stories!

BONUS SLOTS & DELECTABLE FREE SPINS
Slot machine games that give you the chance to win BIG with the Daily Bonus, Streak Bonus and VIP Bonus.
Bet big with millions of FREE CREDITS and dozens of bonuses!
Up the ante with delectable Free Spins and sweet JACKPOT pay-outs.
Spin the prize wheel to win sweet rewards like extra coins.

SLOTS - THE MOST EXCITING SPINS AVAILABLE ANYWHERE
Spin slots online or offline, wherever you go.
Send and receive Wonka Bar gifts between you and your friends.
View your friends’ progress by connecting to Facebook.
Keep playing! You can sync your level of play across all your devices.

Download Willy Wonka Slots for the sweetest and most authentic slot machines. Don’t wait – Your delicious wins await!

FROM THE MAKERS OF WIZARD OF OZ SLOTS

Get ready for spring with the latest release from Willy Wonka Slots!
• Celebrate Easter in the Golden Egg Hatchery with the latest theme of ‘Help the Oompa Loompas’!
• Earn Big on your purchases with the ‘Magic Win’ fortune cookie’!
• Take a nostalgic trip to the Pure Imagination Room with the latest High Roller World machine: ‘Everything is Edible’!
• Enjoy a smoother play experience than ever before with all-new bug fixes and updates
